content: Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the lowest section of The Webbed Hollow, he is one of the many frog minibosses you can encounter in the game, though he sports a hidden surprise.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the lowest section of The Webbed Hollow, he is one of the many frog minibosses you can encounter in the game, though he sports a hidden surprise.
